1382920.name: Caravan Trade Tycoon
1382920.description:
Did you ever think how would it be if you were a merchant in the middle ages? You didn't? Well, it would be a fun experience if you ask me. Be ready to be the richest merchant in the Quadia!

Key Features




Be a merchant in the middle ages! Try to earn as much as you can with trading items. Also, to earn even more purchase and manage the workshops. Upgrade your caravan and find the best trade route!



Trade in more than 500 cities across 9 countries. Every city has its own population, price rates for items, items, and gold. Also, every month in the game population and gold of the city increases while the price rates change.



There are more than 100 items in-game. There are 10 different categories for the items. Pay attention to those categories' price rates to earn a profit.



Every single item in the game can be produced by the player. To produce items, you should purchase workshops. There are 8 different workshops for different items. Workshops in more developed cities are a lot more expensive but you can upgrade them more.



When you sell and produce enough of an item, you can establish a brand for it. With a brand, you can sell that specific item for higher prices.



Quadia is a lot of things, but a safe place is not one of them. You should hire soldiers to protect your shiny golds and precious goods. However, pay attention to your weekly balance, since you should give soldiers some salary every week. Also, you can upgrade your soldiers when they earn some experience on the battlefield.



Level up by selling goods. Each time you level up, you would earn a perk point. With those perk points, you can unlock perks that would give you an advantage while you are on your journey. There are 41 perks to choose from 2 different perk categories: Army and Trade.



You can have your own stores in the cities. You can decide the price of the goods. However, you should pay attention to the price rates of the city since the higher price means a lower probability of a sale. Each time you sell a good, you would earn some reputation. With enough reputation, you can sell your goods for even higher prices. However, it is hard to gain a reputation in the bigger cities.

highlighted.name: The Best Merchant In The Galaxy
